textdraw_copy._value: This catalogue provides an overview of the available form components and fragments. In addition to the standard components, the following pages contain, if available, customer-specific components and fragments.

email.name: email
email.validatePictureClauseMessage: Bitte geben Sie eine gültige E-Mail Adresse an (z.B. max.muster@beispiel.ch).

telephone.name: phone
telephone.validatePictureClauseMessage: Bitte geben Sie eine gültige Telefonnummer inkl. Ländervorwahl (z.B. +41) an.

datepicker.jcr:title: Date Picker
datepicker.name: datePicker
datepicker.validatePictureClauseMessage: Bitte geben Sie das Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY (z.B. 01.01.2020) an.

timebox.jcr:title: Time Box
timebox.name: timebox
timebox.validatePictureClauseMessage: Bitte geben Sie die Zeit im Format HH:MM (z.B. 09:30) ein

fileupload.jcr:title: File Upload
fileupload.name: fileupload
fileupload.uploadBrowserInfoText: or click here to browse your computer.
fileupload.uploadDropInfoText: Drag and drop your files here
fileupload.uploadFileTypeMessage: The file type is not allowed.
fileupload.uploadMaxFileSizeMessage: The file size of {{filesize}} MB exceeds the maximum allowed file size of {{maxFilesize}} MB.
fileupload.validateExpMessage: Please fill in the mandatory fields.

disclaimerText.value: This document is strictly private, confidential and personal to its recipients and should not be copied, distributed or reproduced in whole or in part, nor passed to any third party.
